group.text: Oh right, I've heard about that.

It's such a simple, such a clichÃ© thing.
You can't succeed without failure.
For me venturing on is hopefully a lifestyle.

It's this idea of constantly discovering, constantly being
curious and constantly hoping that the road has no end.

I'm curious about things. I'm curious about the world,
about different cultures, about different kinds of people,

and it's my curiosity and my selfishness of
wanting to find that out about myself,
that drives me to do new kinds of projects.

I'm very lucky though that I've been able to build
an audience that goes on that trip with me.

In some ways I like to be very prepared and study and learn
about it and figure out what my point of view is going to be.
But I also don't want to know too much.

I kind of always approach in two ways, being somewhat
prepared and somewhat ready just to be surprised.
